attributes.action: Create a Cardiff Capital Region (CCR) of Wales ; Led by a Directly Elected Mayor
attributes.background:
* We Petition that the UK Parliament passes a Cardiff Capital Region (CCR) Act , formally creating the Cardiff Capital Region (CCR) of Wales. 

* Elections for the Mayor of Cardiff Capital Region (CCR) could then Follow ; together with Elections for Members of the Cardiff Regional Council (CRC).

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
